attributes.action: LOWER the fuel prices with immediate affect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oil is now almost a third CHEAPER than it was in June, yet still we are paying high fuel costs with further rises in the pipeline.

This should NOT be allowed to happen, and it's about time the Government stepped in to crush this sheer profiteering which is bringing this country to it's knees !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
